titleInfo.title: The concept of intelligence in AI
Prerational Intelligence: Adaptive Behavior and Intelligent Systems without Symbols and Logic

bibliographicCitation.default:
Wachsmuth I (2000)
In: Prerational Intelligence: Adaptive Behavior and Intelligent Systems without Symbols and Logic. Cruse H, Dean J, Ritter H (Eds); Dordrecht, The Netherlands: Kluwer Academic Publishers: 43-55.
